item.title: Macos Update Time via Ntpserver
item.author: Author
item.description: How to update time via ntpserver Today, My MBP is out of power. I cannot surfing internet. and the brower tell me my time was wrong. Then I checked my time in my MBB, I’m back in time jan 1, 2018. Wow, I got extra whole year time!
